subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants embody two extremes on defense, but they give up 20.5 points per game over all, which is a big reason the team is 2-2 entering Sunday’s matchup against the San Francisco 49ers.
snippet: The Giants embody two extremes on defense, but they give up 20.5 points per game over all, which is a big reason the team is 2-2 entering Sunday’s matchup against the San Francisco 49ers.
